title: K.I.S.S rule in a music app format!
comment: Love the simplicity of the app.  Can you put an option to change tracks by swiping the screen left of right.  Thanks! (K.I.S.S rule- keep it simple stupid)

title: Pretty great!
comment: It's not some fancy material holo yolo. It just works wonderful that's it.

title: Pretty good!
comment: I would love an option to shuffle all music in the current folder (entire collection or artist). It would allow me to replace Shuttle as my main music player on an old, low powered device.

title: Really simple player
comment: Simple design, not perfect functionality. My issues are lack of in-line headphone control, and when unplugging headphones the music will continue playing for 2 seconds before stopping.

Thanks for the review!
I've added this ticket for in-line headphone control: https://github.com/smithdtyler/prettygoodmusicplayer/issues/82

If you look in the settings menu, there's an option for "headphone disconnect behavior". It sounds like you have selected the "pause after one second" option.

title: Awesome!!
comment: Awesome light weight player! Liked it very much :-)) Have ask the features that I need 😊

title: Muy rápido muy bueno
comment: Es mi reproductor favorito de audio en android, es rápido y sus gráficos son estilo material design, lo único que lo pudiera hacer mas perfecto es que lea los mp3s de google músic o spotify lists o podcadts

title: Simplistic yet efficient
comment: Stumbled on to this at reddit. And I'm glad I did. The UI couldn't be any simpler and that's the way I like it.

title: Love it!
comment: Get the jobs done, simple and lightweight. Very good.

title: Awesome, but could use a face lift
comment: I love seeing more GPL stuff in the Play store and this is a sweet and simple as you could want, but a little more eye candy would not go amiss:  * Album art from a scrobbler * Some more colours (black and white)     * The white lines are a little thick and possibly unecessary * Some iconography to define the differences between folders and songs

Thanks for the feedback! I made the white lines smaller and will work on adding colors and better icons. 

Update: The new version has lots more color options! 

More fixes coming...

title: Great
comment: Needs some work. But still going to be my main player. Nice work saw on reddit.
Thanks! I'm happy to take any feedback you're willing to share
Your comment made me laugh. I'll admit it's not the prettiest, but to be fair I called it "pretty good" not "very good", so you really can't expect too much :)

title: I like the directory option, but the ui is brutal
comment: should be a button that says ”set this directory ” ... still not sure if I did what I wanted ... totally guessing ... and don't make me find a song to play, to start ... let me start playing from the list, and if I do, auto-shuffle ... and apparently it's still not that simple as it's now replaying the same song over and over, on shuffle ... uninstalling

title: Terrible
comment: It just keeps stop working when I click play its the worst music app ever! Get it fixed 😡😡

I'm sorry to hear that it's not working. A couple questions that will help me fix the problem:

1. What format are your audio files?
2. When it stops working, do you see an error message?

Thanks!
Super fast, no useless frills or spamware to get in the way. Also, from a security perspective, it has a nice small footprint and doesn't ask for resources it doesn't need.
